scripts.preinstall: node src/scripts/install-types.js || echo 'Type installation failed, continuing'
scripts.postinstall: npm rebuild bcrypt --build-from-source || echo 'bcrypt rebuild failed, continuing'
scripts.render-build: npm install && node src/scripts/debug-environment.js && npm rebuild bcrypt --build-from-source && npm install --save-dev typescript @types/express @types/node @types/uuid @types/jsonwebtoken @types/cookie-parser @types/cors @types/multer && node src/scripts/copy-express-types.js && node src/scripts/remove-express-file.js && node build-without-types.js
scripts.prod-build: npm install && npm run build && npm prune --production
scripts.fix-build: rimraf dist && npm install --save-dev @types/express && npm install && npx tsc --project tsconfig.deploy.json
